model.elements

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.elements.GameElement
      • model.elements.KillableGameElement
        • model.elements.Player

  • public class Player
extends KillableGameElement
    Spacecraft that the actual player will control. Has one life, but there are more of them.
